description.plain:
Coco (Taylor Nave, born 1996) & Clair Clair (Claire Toothill, born 1994) is an American alternative hip-hop/bedroom pop duo from Atlanta, Georgia.

Coco makes beats, they both sing and rap. Their main musical influences are Charli XCX, Lil B, and Grimes, as well as Junglepussy.

After having met on Twitter, they released their debut song “P.O.S.H. (Get Off My Snapchat)”, produced by Slug † Christ, in 2016.

Their debut project, the seven-track album POSH, was released in April 2017. They released an EP, Treat Like Gold, in 2020.

In 2022, they announced their second album Sexy, to be released in November. With several past tracks released as standalone singles slated to appear on the album, the first new single from the album, “Cherub”, was released on September 16, 2022.
